title: The bestest
text:
We already miss you, Louis. You made our trip unforgatible. Viva forever.
Remember, bohemia ascura?!(
place: La Zebra Beach Restaurant and Bar

title: The best of the bestest
text: The restaurant looks very simple and in a shady area of downtown, but the seafood is fantastic and their home wine is delicious too. I prefer simple and fresh seafood (no overthinking), and this place exceeded my expectations. PS it's cheap too. And if they bring you bread and you don't want it, tell them right away, they will charge you for it

title: Amazing view
text: Not sure how authentic this is, looks like a lot of parts of parthenon have been replaced, but tools very very impressive.

title: I wish it was a little bit more descriptive
text: It's quite an interesting museum, but a lack of history description made the trip here a little bit boring. I wish all this peiece of history and a story to tell, but no.. they just hang there with a tag.

title: pizza that is actually good for you
text: We come to this place once or every 2 weeks, excellent choice for healthy eating, you don't feel 'heavy' or sick after you eat your whole pizza! I, personally, can't digest any other pizza in town..! I always have my food with a nice side of arugula salad and sometimes soup, Yamm! It's clean and service is friendly.They have good European beers on tap as well, try delirium! If you think pizza 73 is delicious, this place is not for you...

title: the best airport location, but no windows
text: The best location, no doubt. I am a bit claustrophobic, so this hotel is not a good option for me. There are no windows, and if you turn off the lights, it is a complete darkness. I will stay at this hotel only of I really have too. They should warn that there are no windows in the rooms.

title: Fantastic
text: In the heart of Edmonton! Delicious Korean food - wow! Delicious and fresh! I really liked that in my seafood soup there was no animal byproduct. And i asked for no mussels, and i got my food the way i wanted:)

title: Very good
text: It's hard to find Korean vegetarian options in Edmonton/Calgary, but this place has amazing options with soft tofu. I normally can't stand tofu, but their soft tofu is just anazing!

title: Pretty restaurant with ennoying music and slow service
text: I like restaurants where you get warm welcome and great service, unfortunately, this is not a case for DOM. Their food was alright, but I didnt like the ambiance, i felt that music was too fast and too futuristic for this kind of restaurant. I won't be back.

title: Great veiw, tasty food, and good service
text: If you are looking for a scenic view and relaxed atmosphere, this place is right for you. Smiling server was there for us, the food was great. My sister loved their pasta a lot.

title: Could be better
text: Nice food and beer verity, cozy design, intersting music selection, excellent people watching spot but very slow service.. The restaurant was empty and bored servers were haning out by the entrance. My fish soup took a while unless they make every dish from scratch (cought fish from river etc.). All they have to do is to put smile on servers faces and provide good service.

title: Good service but food was so so
text: The service was excellent, food presentaton was good too. I didn't like how it tasted though, I think the fregile taste of seafood was spoiled by sauces and too much salt, not sure if i can recommend this place to anyone.

title: The royal service
text:
If you are looking for the best service in St Peterburg and amazing food, this is the best place for that! Warm greeting, attention to detail, royal service and great food are main priorities of this restaurant. A must try is a Sahalin scallops dish, amazing! No other place can beat this one. There is also Asian restaurant in the Four Seasons, they are simply on par!
Recommend it to everybody! And stop by for a drink in the hotels lounge too.

title: Service was good but food could be better
text: The service was good, above average in St Petersburg, but the chicken I had was awfully salty. I'd say above average service but below everage food with the stunning view!

title: Very clean and nice rooms
text: I've never stayed at Holiday Inn before, and this one at the airport is suprisingly nice! Conveniently located close to airport with 24 hour free buss service. Clean and have a new feel, or may be it's just Scandinavian quality!

title: One of the worst ones
text: The moment you step in you want to walk away. But we gave it a chance! The hostess made us to take off the jackets, we were not allowed to wear them ( we had summer jackets). After this unpleasant experience we still decided to have dinner there. There are 2 sections of the restaurant, they sat us at the very casual one, right under the aircon. We had to wait quite a while for a server. Finally, after a long wait, an irritated lady came over, she took our order, but it completely turned us away. I asked her to cancel our order, we took a cab to Four Seasons, to the best restaurants in town!

title: I recommend this place to everybody
text: Good food, great drinks, outstanding service, excellent music - a rare combo for Edmonton! We come to this place very often, and we've never been disapponted.

title: Not to European standards
text: This was my 3rd trip to this place. The first 2 times, I didn't buy anything. Everything just looked old, and not edible. After all this PM saying it's his favourite bake shop, I thought I just have to try it. So, I got some eclairs, some hazelnut pastries, and a fruit brioche (or something like that). Eclairs are my favourite European treats, and the ones from this bake shop were just exactly what you would expect from Canadian pastry: dry and stale, as if it was sitting there for quite a while, and that sweet butter inside...and in top...This was my first and the last visit.

title: nice gateway!
text: In the winter time, it is the best place to escape to. It feels like a nice vacation to a warm country. Very well taken care of, beautiful displays, it's worth a trip, for sure. Extremely small, but one of a kind in Edmonton.

title: If you like Greasy food, this place is for you
text: The food we ordered lacked any taste, the chicken sandwich I had didn't taste like anything, just grease all over it. There are better places for smoked meats around.

title: Excelence
text: Your check in starts with the personal service, they already checked you profile and they know you need a late check out! Fine fabrics and attention to detail is all about Kamp hotel\s rooms! Try their Kamp burger, it is to die for. I don't normally eat french fries ( actually never), but the ones that are being served with Kamp burger are sooo goood!! The only miss was that the server didn't know why the hotel had a name "Kamp"...

title: Lobby bar
text: We didn't stay at the hotel, we only had tea and coffee in the lobby bar 2 days in a row. The service was prompt and intuitive. The server even remembered the tea we had the day before, she was very welcoming and smiling! The lobby bar is an excellent place to relax and escape from the busy streets of the downtown area! Trust me, it is hard to find good service in St Petersburg!
place: Grand Hotel Europe, A Belmond Hotel, St Petersburg

title: Poor service at the lobby bar
text: We only had tea at this hotel after visiting Saint Isaac cathedral. The lobby bar was not busy, but the service was very slow. The server looked very sad, tired, and a bit irritated. There were 2 of us, but my boyfriend stepped away for a couple of minutes, so the server served only me. When my boyfriend came back, she completely ignored him. Then the server didn't even bring the bill, so we had to chase her..After she printed tons of different papers, we finally could get out from this place. This short experience was very dissapointing!

title: Good for drinks but not for food
text: We tried some food off the menu and it was quite bad and disappointing! This place is PERFECT for drinks and conversations! it reminds me a lot of Woodwork in downtown!

title: Hotel's lounge
text: Hotel and service are amazing but I would like to comment on their lounge in particular. In the summer time, their lounge has the best, sorry, the bestEST patio in town. No restaurant can beat that view. Staff are great and the food is simply delicous! I recommend.

title: Got even better
text: This is our second stay at Jardin de Frida, the first one was excellent and it just got better! Don't get me wrong, I've stayed at fancy Fairmont hotels, but this place is so unique and inviting! Unfortunately, restaurant was closed, so we didn't have a chance to try their food. We were really happy to see Frida and Coco! They look very well taken care of and happy;)! I can not wait to come here next year again!

title: Beautiful and relaxing
text: Such a nice escape from Edmonton! Easy drive, beautiful mountains, clean air! Lodge is beautiful and it feels like home there! It feels like a country side house. Don't expect anything fancy, it's wilderness there. I can imagine how expensive it is to run business there! Try bison burger, Tuna salad, carrot cake, and honey brown beer. Don't forget to have a coffee with Baileys! Enjoy ur stay!

title: Simple and clean
text: Of course it is not a luxury hotel, but it's very clean, simple and comfortable! It's right in downtown and very convenient! I stayed at many hotels and this one is just right for business travel. Staff are very friendly and I didn't have any problem with them! Enjoy ur stay!

title: Old and need some upgrades
text: It's quite old and needs a lot of renovations. Most stores repeat themselves. If you are lazy and you are a consumerist, this is a place for you!

title: Run down, lots of creeps
text: This place is not too bad, has some vintage style to it. There is a very nice place to try some international beers( unfortunately, bottled)-European Accent Lounge. If you are stuck in Edmonton, for sure. It's worth checking it out.

title: Great delicious beers!
text: Very good selection of international beers! For sure, we r coming back for more! Food is alright, but beers ate great! Try hazelnut brown nectar, so tasty!

title: Tasty vegitarian pizza, beer selection is so so
text: Very very tasty vegitarian pizza on the menus they have, with done pine nuts. Beer selection is not so good. I felt like I was in airport waiting for my flight with all those screen beer menus, not sure if we will be back there ! Plus, they get too busy and too nosy..

title: The best Canadian beer is served here
text: It's a nice place to go for beers! Try their blueberry beer served with real blueberries. They have a nice variety of beers u can not find anywhere else!

title: Great hotel, no front desk service ..
text: Nice little hotel, I would stay there again - no doubt! I had ground level room, even though I hate ground levels - room was pretty nice! There is no front desk 24/7, so you have to work their schedule, unfortunately!

title: Home away from home
text:
It's been almost 3 months since we left the hostel, but the memories are still fresh;) we were going to stay at the hostel only for 1 week, ended up staying for more than a month!! Their private room and apartments are amazing! We miss Frida and Coco. They were the hardest ones to say good bye to..we fell in love with them.
we loved this place!;)

title: 'Beachhouse"'
text: House is beautiful and clean! There is no beach next to the beachhouse and it's far from everything(taxi, car, scooter, bike required). We couldn't do our laundry there either. Most people come here to scuba dive, so I guess location for them doesn't really matter! All nearby beaches have entrance fee. Next time, I would stay in downtown.

title: Tranquility
text: Hotel is located in the very quiet and grean area! I would also recommend to stroll around, it's very beautiful and peaceful! Careful at night - lots of frogs, insects, and bats around the hotel. I enjoyed my stay a lot after visiting busy Playa Del Carmen. We had our breakfast and dinner at the hotels restaurant and we endured enjoyed it! People here are very laid back and are not in a rush, so relax and enjoy your time!

title: Poor room's quality
text: Staff are really nice, grounds are pretty, food is alright, my favorite was Mexican cuisine! Very poor selection of fruits, real juices, real fruit smoothies etc! Very few fish dishes, and some were very greasy. Room was bad, smelly and old! But after all, it's a good value since all food and drinks were included. We wouldn't stay here again!

title: Great place!!!
text: I spent there 7 days, private room, and would defiantly recommend this hostel.
